comment: I already know the top five football teams for : St . John Bosco , Mater Dei , Corona Centennial , Sierra Canyon , Servite . And that s before any quarterback transfers .
amr:
# ::snt I already know the top five football teams for : St . John Bosco , Mater Dei , Corona Centennial , Sierra Canyon , Servite . And that s before any quarterback transfers .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / know-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t / team
                  :quant 5
                  :mod (f / football)
                  :mod (t2 / top)
                  :domain (a / and
                        :op1 (t3 / team
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "St."
                                    :op2 "John"
                                    :op3 "Bosco"))
                        :op2 (t4 / team
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Mater"
                                    :op2 "Dei"))
                        :op3 (t5 / team
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Corona"
                                    :op2 "Centennial"))
                        :op4 (t6 / team
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Sierra"
                                    :op2 "Canyon"))
                        :op5 (t7 / team
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "Servite"))))
            :time (a2 / already))
      :snt2 a
      :op2 (b / be-temporally-at-91
            :ARG1 (t8 / that)
            :ARG2 (b2 / before
                  :op1 (t9 / transfer-01
                        :ARG1 (q / quarterback)
                        :mod (a3 / any)))))
